title: Companion Approval Guide
content: of Shar - Once you've been transported down the Inner Sanctum, interact with the Ancient Altar and place three Umbral Gems you've collected to unlock the door ahead. Go down the stairs and interact with the Shadowfell Entrance. Before entering the Shadowfell Entrance, agree with Shadowheart about the sacrifice she needs to perform for Lady Shar Daughter of Darkness The Chosen of Shar Requirements/Details: Interact with the Shadowfell Entrance, then choose the option "All right. Fine. Let's move
